item.title: Try as you might, you cannot beat ‘em
item.author: Becks Simpson,
item.description: It’s been an amazing couple of weeks for women’s rugby, with three consecutive wins, all the hard work this season has really started to pay off. Most recently with a glowing 69-10 win over Kingston and a 38-5 win against Roehampton the week before, propelling Women’s Rugby into the South-Eastern …

item.title: IC Women’s Rugby: Brunel convert to victory
item.author: Felix Editor,Becks Simpson,
item.description: After last Saturday’s devastatingly close defeat to Brunel in a friendly, Imperial was on a mission to right this wrong and be deemed victorious on the pitch. They marched out with determination – the likes of which has not been seen since we put a man on the moon – with two subs to cheer them on. …
